about_the_game:
Build Your Story, Complete Your Quest.

Of Ink and Silver is an action rpg set in the world of Ox, a land populated by mysterious creatures and mystical powers. A powerful order of knights, keepers of ancient secrets, entrusts you with a task, a Quest. Will you fulfill your duty? Or will you doubt the Order and its secretive Elders?

 

A new world to explore and make your own.

Of Ink and Silver is set in a classic and stupendous medieval fantasy world to explore, full of different features and uniquities, being able to move in a 3D setting that rewards the combination of curiosity and skill in a new mixture of entertainment made of secrets to discover and quests to complete.

With extensive and varied Character creation, prepare to begin your Quest by choosing your appearance and origins, which will bestow different abilities depending on your decision.

 

Clashes as Classic as Epic.

Combat in Of Ink and Silver is simple to learn, but offers varying levels of skill, and sometimes not easy to achieve. To make this world your own and write your own story, you will have to strike the right balance between attacking and avoiding damage, using a variety of weapons and mystical abilities made available to you as you explore the world and its secrets.

The Quest.

Face the adventure and your enemies for the sole purpose of finishing your “Quest,” the task given to you at the beginning of your journey to please the Order of the Silver Rose.

Tackle the various challenges before you, exploring the world, taking on side quests and discovering new weapons and abilities so that you can overcome any foe that stand in your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5 8th gen or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5 8th gen or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended
